entity.title: eBay Active Listings Variation based on eBay API GetSellerList call

field.name: varSpecsId
field.description: Auto ID for eBay Active Listing Variation Specifics

field.name: activeListingId
field.description: Auto ID for eBay Active Listing

field.name: variationSeqId
field.description: eBay active Listing Variation Sequence Id

field.name: listingShippingId
field.description: Auto ID for eBay Active Listing Shipping

field.name: activeListingId
field.description: Auto ID for eBay Active Listing

field.name: orderId
field.description: Wish's unique identifier for the order

field.name: transactionId
field.description: Orders can be grouped under unique identifiers if the user makes several purchases at once

field.name: productId
field.description: Wish's unique identifier for the Product being ordered

field.name: variantId
field.description: Wish's unique identifier for the Product Variation that was ordered

field.name: buyerId
field.description: Wish's unique identifier for the buyer of the order

field.name: quantity
field.description: The number of units that the user has purchased

field.name: sku
field.description: The unique identifier of the item in your system

field.name: size
field.description: The size of the item that was ordered (if applicable)

field.name: color
field.description: The color of the item that was ordered (if applicable)

field.name: state
field.description: The state of the order. This value can be: APPROVED, SHIPPED, REFUNDED, REQUIRE_REVIEW

field.name: shippingProvider
field.description: This is the courier that has been used to ship the package

field.name: trackingNumber
field.description: This is the number a user can use to track their package with your carrier

field.name: shippedDate
field.description: The date the the order was marked as shipped

field.name: shipNote
field.description: The note to the user when you marked the order as shipped (if applicable)

field.name: lastUpdated
field.description: The date and time of the last update to the order (for example, the last change in state)

field.name: orderTotal
field.description: The total value of the order

field.name: daysToFulfill
field.description: Number of days left to fulfill this order. Order not fulfilled will be automatically refunded.

field.name: hoursToFulfill
field.description: Number of hours left to fulfill this order. Order not fulfilled will be automatically refunded.

field.name: price
field.description: The price of the item when the user purchases one

field.name: cost
field.description: The amount of money that Wish pays you for the product (per unit)

field.name: shipping
field.description: The amount of money user pays for shipping for the product(per unit)

field.name: shippingCost
field.description: The amount of money that Wish pays you for shipping the product (per unit)

field.name: orderTime
field.description: The date and time of when the order was placed

field.name: refundedBy
field.description: A description of who refunded the order

field.name: refundedTime
field.description: The time when the order was refunded

field.name: refundedReason
field.description: The reason the order was refunded

field.name: isWishExpress
field.description: True if the order is a Wish Express order

field.name: weRequiredDeliveryDate
field.description: The date that an order must be received by a customer (only valid for Wish Express orders)

field.name: trackingConfirmed
field.description: Whether tracking is confirmed or not

field.name: trackingConfirmedDate
field.description: The date that tracking was confirmed

field.name: orderId
field.description: Wish's unique identifier for the order

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the person who this order is being shipped to

field.name: streetAddress1
field.description: The street address the order is to be shipped to

field.name: streetAddress2
field.description: Extra street address information about the package's destination

field.name: city
field.description: The city name of where the order should be delivered

field.name: state
field.description: The state/region where the order should be delivered

field.name: country
field.description: The country where the order should be delivered

field.name: zipcode
field.description: The zipcode/postal code of the address where the order is to be delivered

field.name: phoneNumber
field.description: The phone number for the carrier to call in the case of missed deliveries
